name: Equestria
startIntroPart1: Princess Celestia, ruler over the magical land of Equestria, seeks to spread the magic of friendship across this strange new land.
startIntroPart2: I, Princess Celestia, settle this land for me, for my friends, FOR EQUESTRIA!!!
attacked: Now that you've revealed your true self, I can protect my subjects from you!
defeated: We know our lands are in good hands with you. It's time for us to be on our way.
introduction: Hi, I'm Princess Celestia. What's your name?
neutralHello: Good morning. Love the new hairstyle. Well, happy Tuesday!
hateLetsHearIt: What do you have to say?
afterPeace: Time to put our differences behind us. Will you accept my friendship?
tradeRequest: I, Princess Celestia, hereby decree this request to my faithful neighbor.
